title: Network Traffic Analysis
subtitle: Security Research
description: Captured and analyzed live network packets using Wireshark and TCPdump. Practiced filtering, dissecting, and interpreting network logs for forensic and monitoring use cases.

title: Penetration Testing
subtitle: Vulnerability Assessment
description: Executed vulnerability scans using Nmap for network reconnaissance. Used Metasploitable to simulate real-world attacks and gain hands-on experience in exploiting security flaws.

title: Web Security Testing
subtitle: Application Security
description: Used Burp Suite to intercept and manipulate HTTP requests. Identified and experimented with basic web vulnerabilities such as input tampering, cookie manipulation, XSS and SQLi basics.
